content.description: Mostly a one move wonder but worth doing. Pull the exciting 5.7 roof move about midway through the upper roof band-see photo.
content.protection: Good gear all the way up. a purple cam works great under the roof. After the roof, go straight up for a gear anchor (walk off to retrieve gear), or climb right to the 'Puppies in the Mist' tree.
content.location: Starts on a slab in between Puppy Love and Puppies in the Mist.

climbs.name: Puppy Love
climbs.fa: Mike Reardon, Willy Munder, Conrad Leavitt

content.description: Slightly dirty but worth it if you made the hike. Crux is down low following the Comatose-like flake up and right. Exit the roof/flake where you can, after placing a number 4-5 under the flake. Face climb past a vertical crack for pro to a small roof. Exit the roof left or right, where ever it is free of lichen. Set a trad anchor on the tree ledge above.
content.protection: #5 is good for the flake, standard rack with TCU's. You can rap the tree to the right above 'Puppies in the Mist' or walk off left after retrieving your gear
content.location: Left most route on the wall starting at the obvious right leaning flake, leading to an obvious roof band, and ending at the tree ledge above.

climbs.name: Puppies in the Mist
climbs.fa: Mike Reardon, Willy Munder, Conrad Leavitt

content.description: Nice climb, nice view, nice horns, exciting but well protected opening moves over the bulge. It is runout after the bulge but easy.
content.protection: TCU's at the beginning, sling 2-3 horns, then a #1 or 2 in the flake up high near the top. Use the tree for the anchor, rap or walk off left
content.location: Middle of the rock. Start on about 25 feet right of Puppy Love at a tree, left of a bushy ledge that is 25' off the ground

content.description: Named after a Marvin Pontiac song and just as fun. Slab climbing and good horns.
content.protection: This takes a lot of gear and would be a good first trad lead. A few long runners to sling horns up top, Small TCU's, a few medium cams to a 2 bolt anchor. Shares anchors with "Groove is in the Heart"
content.location: 25 feet right of Puppies in the Mist. Starts at a 5.6 slab just right of a bushy ledge 25 feet up and left of the one 50 feet up

climbs.name: Groove is in the Heart
climbs.fa: Mike Reardon, Sandra Campagna, Gary Pisano

content.description: Mostly a solo. Climb an easy slab without pro for 50 feet to the tree ledge. Work right from the ledge towards the corner for gear, then back left to the anchors at the top. Shares anchors with 'I Stink When I'm Wet'.
content.protection:
3 pieces total in 100 feet

2 bolt belay
content.location: Right most climb on the wall, starts about 15 feet from the end of the wall
